briefTitle: Long Term Study of RBP 7000 in the Treatment of Subjects With Schizophrenia
officialTitle: An Open-Label, Long-Term Safety and Tolerability Study of RBP-7000 in the Treatment of Subjects With Schizophrenia
summary: This is a Phase 3, open label study administering RBP-7000 in the treatment of patients with schizophrenia. Study will assess the long-term safety and tolerability of RBP-7000 subcutaneous (SC) injections in subjects with schizophrenia and to continue collecting clinical outcome data with RBP-7000 SC injections in subjects with schizophrenia using the Positive and Negative Syndrome Scale (PANSS) and Clinical Global Impression-Severity Illness (CGI-S) scale.
